title: Remove character limit on lyrics input

requirements.summary: Remove the maximum character limit validation from LyricsInput component while keeping the minimum 20 character requirement
acceptanceCriteria: The lyrics textarea accepts any number of characters without upper limit validation
The minimum 20 character requirement remains enforced
The character count display shows the current count without showing a maximum
The submit button remains enabled as long as the minimum 20 character requirement is met
No error messages appear when typing beyond the previous 2,000 character limit

file_operations.description: Remove the maximum character limit validation (currently 2,000 characters) from the lyrics textarea. Update the character count display to show only the current count without a maximum. Keep the minimum 20 character validation and ensure the submit button is enabled when the minimum requirement is met. Remove any error messages or visual indicators related to the 2,000 character maximum limit.
